title: FL STUDIO 8 TIMEBOM stop
description:
Hello all,

I am a big FL Studio fan.

so i downloaded fl8 on the than it suddenly stopped working....
now i changed the date in my system clock to 14th of March and IT WORKS! it seems that somebody did not want us to be able to run it after the 14th of March!



I made this script IF=EU

if your fl studio is on your D: drive: open txt editor. To easy ......




@ Title FL.Studio 8 EU STARTER -pcalarm- ***  If YOU ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬an e$$ord it BUY it !!!!  ***
@ echo off
@ set tdtd=none
@ for /F \"tokens=2-4\" %%i in (\&#039;date /t\&#039;) do set tdtd=%%i%%j%%k
@ set tufn=c:\\fl8
@ type NUL>%tufn%
@ set AAA=%tdtd%
@ if exist c:\\fl8 echo %AAA%> c:\\fl8
@ if not exist c:\\fl8 echo no.
@ date 14.3.2008
@ start \"FL Studio\" \"c:\\Program Files\\Image-Line\\FL Studio 8\\FL.exe\"
@ ping 1.1.1.1 /n 3 /w 1000 > NUL
@ date < c:\\fl8
@ del c:\\fl8
@ EXIT




( I donÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢??t want your money, I just want your software)
